overview: While dining out with friends, Sy suggests the difficulty of separating comedy from tragedy. To illustrate his point, he tells his guests two parallel stories about Melinda ; both versions have the same basic elements, but one take on her state of affairs leans toward levity, while the other is full of anguish. Each story involves Melinda coping with a recent divorce through substance abuse while beginning a romantic relationship with a close friend's husband.
tagline: Life can be a comedy or a tragedy, it all depends on how you look at it.
cast: Radha Mitchell|Will Ferrell|Amanda Peet|Chloë Sevigny|Chiwetel Ejiofor
